description.value: If you aren't using @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.HPrjgPXLsDRBbfsD]{Mark for Death} or a different ranger mark, you deal your Mark for Death damage on all attacks regardless. If you use a different mark, like @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-feats.Item.v4I2jKOQ4pCIetja]{Mark of Affliction}, this ability does not function at the same time.
